bibl.seg: VERDULT Philip A., P. Erasmianae II. Parts of the Archive of an Arsinoite Sitologos from the Middle of the Second Century BC. (Studia Amstelodamensia ad epigraphicam, ius antiquum et papyrologicam pertinentia. XXXII.)
Amsterdam, J.C. Gieben, 1991, 4°, vii-176 pp., 1 tabl., 1 carte et 37 pll., 4 dépl. Hfl. 275.
P. Erasm. II, 23-58. - 1. [Texts.] - 2. The loading-orders and the naukleros-symbola. - 3. The loading-orders. - 4. The naukleros-symbola. - 5. Indices and lists.
